CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 30, 1961, pg. 13 reads:" Termon Girls, Party Guests - This brilliant array of girls from the Termon Avenue Home were special dinner and party guests of the Clover White Club, last Saturday afternoon, at the Calanthean Hall on Centre Ave. Members of the host group provided turkey dinners, with all the trimmings, for the girls, each of whom received a bag of treats, an individual gift, and had her choice from this table of costume jewelry.  Mrs. Mary N. Smith is president of the Clover White Club.  Mrs. Betty Harris, a housemother, is standing back row, right. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of children from Termon Avenue Home, and Betty Harris standing on right in back row, posed around table in Calanthean Hall, Centre Avenue, for dinner given by the Clover White Club
